dt-option.name: language.searchBuilder.deleteTitle
dt-option.summary: Set the `title` attribute of the SearchBuilder delete criteria button

type.description: `-init language.searchBuilder.deleteTitle` changes the `title` of the SearchBuilder delete criteria button.

dt-option.description:
As standard, SearchBuilder will set the delete criteria button's `title` to 'Delete filtering rule'. This `title` is displayed when the mouse hovers over the delete button.
The value of `-init language.searchBuilder.deleteTitle` is passed into an `-api i18n()` function.

example.title: Change title attribute for SearchBuilder delete criteria button
